    • Method Detail

      • createKit

        public static java.lang.Boolean createKit(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          java.lang.String kitName)
        Creates a new kit with the specified name. This will save all items in the player's inventory to the new kit. This will save all items, with custom names and enchants.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is creating a kit.
        kitName - The name of the kit to be created.
        Returns:
        true is successful, else false.

      • removeKit

        public static java.lang.Boolean removeKit(java.lang.String kitName)
        Deletes or removes the specified kit from file.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to remove.
        Returns:
        true is successful, else false.

      • getKit

        public static java.util.ArrayList<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getKit(java.lang.String kitName)
        Gets an ArrayList containing all items from the specified kit. Will return an empty ArrayList if the kit does not exist.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to get.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all items in the kit.

      • kitExists

        public static java.lang.Boolean kitExists(java.lang.String kitName)
        Checks if the specified kit exists.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The kit to check.
        Returns:
        true is it exists, else false.
